divs: sighting detailshello i am sending this video to you for review. this happen on 5\25\2012 at 6:30 pm in the palmdale, ca area. i am using a sony trv-530 camcorder with a ir 720 filter. i was facing toward the west filming the clouds. i caught this on my camcorder and saw it after it was downloaded to my computer. there are triangular lights at the end of the video. it will be between time of 1:35 seconds and 1:41 sec . there will be a street light to the right of the screen . then to the left side middle of the screen 2 lights on top and 1 faint on the bottom appear for a short time. thank you
